::Decadel::

      Decadel transformed and leaped away from Deemos.

      =
 "Hey buddy, kill the slaggin' bot!!!!  You actually think I still fight on=
 the side of these idiots????  In fact, to show that I am no longer a Preda=
con under their authority, I'll do this!!!" Decadel said.  His shoulder can=
nons popped out, "Stand back!!" He said, then he fired both of his plasma s=
houlder cannons right at Pseudo!!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: T=
HECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 7:53=
 PM
  Subject: Re: The UNDER-World



       
       My Groups | nbwrpg Mai=
n Page | Start a new group!  



  Deemos reached down and sliced Psuedo so=
me. He spun around and ripped Psuedo from Decadel's grip.

  "You really wa=
nt this Predacon to die, don't you? You just may get your wish!" Deemos say=
s...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dcoburn 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 5:49 AM
    Subject: The =
UNDER-World





    ::Decadel::

             Decadel put his book back on=
 it's shelf.

             "Stupid Predacons.  Who needs those idiots!!!" H=
e said.  He walked over to Hell Drak.  He could sense a battle at the Preda=
con Cave.  He grabbed Hell Drak and punched her in the face a couple times,=
 enough to keep her knocked out long enough.  He trapped her in a cell in h=
is lair, and then dug off to the battle.  
    (After time)
            Dec=
adel was now under Deemos, who was holding Pseudo.  Maximals.  Heh.  He may=
 dislike his Predacon folk, but he HATES Maximals.  The Maximals wouldn't w=
in!!!  They will lose!!!!!  Decadel jumped up out of the ground(He only goe=
s underground in beast mode), grabbed Pseudo with his tail, and squeezed hi=
m so hard he could practically make him cough out his spark, and pulled so =
hard that Deemos might still be holding onto half of Pseudo, while the othe=
r half was ripped off(Not literally, this doesn't actually happen, but it f=
eels like it!!!)
